function.name: device_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the setting of a specified SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to increase.

groupAction.description: The group action to perform on the device.

levelDelta.description: The level delta to increase the device setting.

predefinedUnit.description: The predefined unit related to the device setting.
